name: Metris
overview: Metris NV, together with its subsidiaries, supplies metrology solutions for dimensional quality control to the engineering, manufacturing, and assembly departments of aerospace, automotive, consumer electronics, energy and medical equipment companies, and their suppliers. The companyâ€™s solutions include measuring hardware, application software, and customer services. Its product portfolio comprises laser scanners; coordinate measuring machine (CMM), a mechanical motorized system designed to move a probe to measure coordinates of points on the surface of an object; articulated measuring arms, a portable measuring system; and Robot CMM Arm, an articulated measuring robot that is automated and portable. The company also provides optical CMM, a portable measurement device for geometrical quality control; laser radar that provides automated, non-contact, and target-less measurement capability for large-volume applications; iGPS, a modular tracking system enabling factory-wide localization of multiple objects with metrology accuracy, applicable in manufacturing and assembly; iSpace, which activates a metrology workspace; X-ray and computed tomography systems; industrial x-ray and computed tomography systems; and X-ray for electronics inspection. In addition, it offers Camio metrology software, a hardware-independent software package that supports CMMs and RCA, and ports to industry-standard equipment; tactile metrology software for CNC, manual, and portable CMM; and point cloud software integrated on the Focus platform. Further, the company provides support and maintenance services, metrology services, and integration services. It sells its products in the Continental Europe, North America, and rest of the world.

acquisitions.source_description: Metris - Metris acquires CMM software company Integrated Quality
